summary: Tested intelligent filter system for Contacts table. All 10 features tested and working correctly. Labels column shows filter chevron, dropdown appears with available options, filtering works correctly, active filters indicator shows above table, 'Limpiar' clears column filter, 'Limpiar todos' clears all filters, custom fields of type select have automatic filters, non-filterable columns (text, number, email, date) don't have filters, multiple label selection shows contacts with ANY selected label (OR logic), filters reset when changing tabs.
critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: isColumnFilterable() function correctly identifies filterable columns (labels, select, multiselect)
VERIFIED: getFilterOptions() returns correct options for labels and custom fields
VERIFIED: toggleFilterValue() handles both single-select and multi-select filters
VERIFIED: clearColumnFilter() removes filter for specific column
VERIFIED: clearAllFilters() removes all active filters
VERIFIED: hasActiveFilters computed property tracks filter state
VERIFIED: filteredContacts applies column filters with OR logic for labels/multiselect
VERIFIED: useEffect resets filters when activeTab changes
VERIFIED: Filter dropdown has data-testid='filter-{columnId}' for testing
VERIFIED: Active filters indicator shows above table with count and clear buttons
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data - 2 clients (Carlos Rodríguez with 'Cliente Premium' label, Juano Pérez Test without labels), 2 prospects with labels (MATRICULADO, NO QUIERE) and custom fields (CURSO, PROFESOR(A))
context_for_next_testing_agent: Intelligent filter system is fully functional. Filter chevrons appear on labels column and custom fields of type select/multiselect. Dropdown shows available options with checkboxes. Active filters indicator appears above table. Filters reset when changing tabs (Clientes/Prospectos/Proveedores).

etiquetas_column_filter_icon.description: ETIQUETAS column shows chevron/arrow icon in header for filtering

filter_dropdown_opens.description: Clicking chevron opens dropdown with available labels

filter_by_label.description: Selecting a label filters table to show only contacts with that label

active_filters_indicator.description: Active filters indicator appears above table showing 'Filtros activos: Etiquetas: X seleccionado(s)'

limpiar_button_clears_column_filter.description: 'Limpiar' button in dropdown clears filter for that column

limpiar_todos_clears_all_filters.description: 'Limpiar todos' button clears all active filters

select_custom_fields_have_filter.description: Custom fields of type 'select' (CURSO, PROFESOR(A)) have automatic filter with single-select options

non_filterable_columns.description: Columns of type text (NOMBRE, WHATSAPP, ALUMNO), number (EDAD), email (EMAIL), date (FECHA DE CREACIÓN) do NOT have filter buttons

multiple_labels_or_logic.description: Filtering by multiple labels shows contacts with ANY of the selected labels (OR logic) - tested with MATRICULADO + NO QUIERE showing 2 contacts

filters_reset_on_tab_change.description: Filters are reset when changing between Clientes/Prospectos/Proveedores tabs

ui_components_verified: Filter chevron button on ETIQUETAS column header
Filter chevron button on CURSO column header (select type)
Filter chevron button on PROFESOR(A) column header (select type)
Radio button options for single-select (custom fields)
Active filters indicator bar above table
'Limpiar todos' button in active filters bar
X button to remove individual filter from indicator
